items.title: South African court rules that Zambia can repatriate body of ex-president
items.description: Edgar Lungu's family has been locked in a bitter dispute with Zambia's government over where to bury him.

items.title: Crocs US sales tumble as shoppers choose trainers
items.description: The rubber clog-maker claims it is competing with a "clear athletic trend" ahead of the World Cup.

items.title: Netanyahu divides Israelis and allies with plan for new military push in Gaza
items.description: The Israeli PM's proposals have provoked condemnation from the UK and the UN

items.title: Ghana investigators find 'black boxes' of helicopter that crashed and killed two ministers
items.description: President John Mahama promises a full investigation into what he called a "personal loss".

items.title: Is the world's oldest leader set for an eighth term?
items.description: Cameroon's Paul Biya would stay in power until he's 99 if he wins October's election.
